website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for cooks who like the idea of the wooden handles, as these kitchen tools are both well-made and useful.
pros: This attractive set stands out for the durable bamboo handles that feel sturdy
Silicone tops won't scratch cookware surfaces
cons: Rare reports of missing pieces upon arrival
Handles may splinter if washed in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooking utensils set! I bought it to match the teal/mint theme I have in my new kitchen and it looks great. I love the color and I was so happy when it didn't get stained when I cooked tomatoes with it. The plastic is thick and heavy, and the handles are elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Raniamus

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: The variety of tools included in the set is very nice. You will likely not need to buy any utensils outside of this. The quality is pretty good too, after a few months of use I haven’t had any wear and tear. While I was concerned the tops were going to disconnect from the handle because they feel a little loose, they haven’t at all. They are fairly easy to clean, although some food seems to lock in that you need to really scrub out. I give 4/5 stars because the spatulas bend and cannot support the weight of some foods i.e. difficult to flip heavy burgers or pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: High quality set
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed by the quality of this set! I was expecting something much flimsier but these are really nice tools. They are made out of material that would be safe to use on nonstick surfaces (metal cooking tools are a no-no as they scratch the nonstick and release carcinogens into your food). The tools are really attractive and the handles are smooth and substantial. I can tell they are going to last me a long time. Super nice bonus that they came with a set of tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper’s Parent

customer_reviews.title: Utensils with a nice holder.
customer_reviews.text: I absolute love this product. I was looking for something that would match my kitchen and give it a modern look also something that comes with a holder with none of the random brand names on it. This is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Mashie Pargevuni

customer_reviews.title: Complete set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kitchen utensil set because it’s a complete set. It has all of the utensils that I need and more. I like how the silicone material cooks with the pans. The kitchen tongs are strong and the tips are soft with the silicone material
customer_reviews.author: Peter T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all around utensil set. The only downside is that when it arrived, SOMEONE was too eager to test the flexibility of the silicone and snapped the solid spatula right out of the box. Side note: if you hand wash these and dry immediately (i.e. don't put in dishwasher or leave soaking in water) they will last much, much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Awesome utensils. I take very good care of these after reading the reviews. I am Italian and cook a lot especially sauces. I make sure I clean them right away and do not let them sit in water. I have had absolutely no issues. These are great and for the money you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N

customer_reviews.title: Premium Quality Product - Love it !
customer_reviews.text: These are really good quality cooking utensil set. The wooden handle are done nicely and feel good quality. Easy to clean as grease do not stick. It has everything you need for your daily cooking needs. One good thing I have already noticed, the silicon material do not get worn off and start falling out like normal plastic products. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SHAF90

customer_reviews.title: Nice utensils
customer_reviews.text: they are so nice, color is super cute, and very easy to use, goo size and also easy to clean. just washing by hand only.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, found much better
customer_reviews.text: The whisk went straight in the garbage. The silicone parts have nothing inside them so if you are trying to use any force at all they bend. The seams between the wood and silicone get disgusting in 1 use. Hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Zac k.

customer_reviews.title: The ends of the utensils bend..
customer_reviews.text: When the ends of the utensils bend, they are not an asset to me in my kitchen. Stirring mashed potatoes seemed to be too heavy of a consistency for these utensils. They went right back.
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Worth it on every level, use them everyday. easy to clean, great look, sturdy handles, love the wood finish. If I had a second kitchen I'd but it again for that one.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, with larger barreled handles!
customer_reviews.text: These cooking utensils are great because of the big handles! I have arthritis and the wooden handles are thick so it's easier to use! When cleaning them I recommend hand washing them to keep the wood from cracking. Mine haven't cracked so far and I've been using them for several months!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to clean, nice color, wood handle, & won’t scratch pots and pans. Cons:I got these right before Christmas and the whisk already broke-the whisk itself fell out of the hole in the wood.
customer_reviews.author: chris morrison

customer_reviews.title: Look great - Work great
customer_reviews.text: We emptied out our kitchen drawer of random kitchen utensils that we never use and bought this one matching set. They look very nice and are very durable. We make sure to hand wash them because of the wooden handles, and they have stayed very nice.
customer_reviews.author: CanM

customer_reviews.title: Durable and everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I love how durable these are and they work great. This set is has everything you need. The tongs even have a clip to lock it into place, makes it easier for storage. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lenhoff

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional
customer_reviews.text: Not very useful when cooking. The rubber part is too flexible to really do anything. But they are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Chaely Andriakos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Nice handle and silicon head.
customer_reviews.text: The handle and silicon head part attaches perfectly. There is no odd smell when i open the package. I tried to use most of set, the strength is strong enough to meet daily use. It is easier than I though to clean the silicon part. So far everything is good
customer_reviews.author: ZL_o3

customer_reviews.title: One broke the first time i used it
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day i used it! I hope the others in the set hold up because they are nice looking
customer_reviews.author: edit6

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Kitchen Utensils
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, high quality. Clean easily though I wouldn't recommend putting in the dishwasher (maybe just our cheap dishwasher). We looked for a while for a utensil set and this was a great value compared to the overpriced sets in specialty type stores.
customer_reviews.author: csabatula

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I dig these utensils. You can tell they're quality when handling them and they're nice to my pots/pans - no scratches after 6 months. Couldn't be happier with these puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Choice Insurance

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: The utensils are not very sturdy, easily bend, the wood is not very durable, fragile, says they could not be left in water. Still use them, but not very happy with them. They do look good.
customer_reviews.author: m.padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing product the fact that I don’t have to worry about using with high heat use and maybe some material ending up in the food is great. Other products tend to melt and makes you wonder what happened to the melting plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Betty ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for non stick pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set very nicely made and cute. It works wonderfully for my non stick pots and pans I don’t have to worry about them getting scratched definitely going to reorder once they’ve worn out
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor wood stain
customer_reviews.text: I had loved the look and feel of these utensils until they got washed. Once washed these dishes the stain on the wood immediately came off, leaving the handles to feel rough and discolored. Some of the utensils were washed by hand and others in the dishwasher. Unfortunately no matter which way I washed them they all ended up the same.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Best utensils I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I might try them out and if I wasn't happy then I'd give them to my bachelor son. They exceeded my dreams. They are durable, easy to clean, and now my favorite of ALL my utensils. I will be buying sets for all 5 of our children for their kitchens. They'll love these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryleigh Kay Transport

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This set was an important addition to my kitchen. It’s so convenient to have it handy during the food preparation and cooking process. They have excellent quality silicone for baking, cooking, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Li

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy well made product. Beautiful Gift.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a gift. I like the looks of the product. It arrived quickly. The product is well made.
customer_reviews.author: DogMom13

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality utensils. Unfortunate that they are hand wash only but they are easy to clean. Food and even sticky residue comes right off the silicone. The set comes with the perfect amount of utensils
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today. They are very cute. And they feel very sturdy. I havent used them yet. They do smell like paint but im sure once i clean them they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: kori

customer_reviews.title: Very good kitchen set
customer_reviews.text: A very good kitchen set, and the reason I like it is that it doesn't cause any non-stick pot scratches. And it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Captain-Sam

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like everything in the utensil set. I've used just about everything but the soup spoon. I would say that the 2 spatulas are bit smaller than what I would like or what I'm use too. Other then that they are really nice and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Schwabe

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like these to cook with but you can’t put in dishwasher. Easy to cook with, but the durability is poor. I was making scrambled eggs and the spatula just snapped. No untypical force or pressure was applied. Even if there was, while only make eggs, the durability should be there.
customer_reviews.author: Lab11

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term solution
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great, but the wooden handles get rough after first wash. The wisk is useless and needs to be redesigned. I will continue to use until they start giving me splinters.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: So sad it didnt worked out
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would love this set, but they had a very strong smell to a quemical I could not tolerate. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A little soft
customer_reviews.text: The tips are a bit flimsy, but they are in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Pitman

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these utensils look! They have also held up well to regular use & multiple washes in dishwasher. Would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: MRP202

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old cooking utensils as I've had them forever. This set makes a great replacement! They are pretty durable so far and so easy to clean almost anything off of them. The set comes with everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a new set of kitchen utensils, this set was so pretty and matched my decor so I went for it. It is a great set, sturdy and looks nice! I may buy another set to give my sister for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: ketchen utensil Set
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to buy this kitchen kit, they are Solid spoon.Slotted spoon.Soup ladle. Pasta server. slotted turner.Spatula.Whisk.Tongs. Small wooden barrel, they are all light blue, very convenient, and easy to clean , our family likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaying

customer_reviews.title: Great product... very durable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Sturdy! Pretty and easy to care for. Wonderful on pots and pans surface! No scratches!
customer_reviews.author: DESOTO

customer_reviews.title: Utensils work as advertise.
customer_reviews.text: The utensils are stylish and sturdy but non abrasive to my granite coated pots.
customer_reviews.author: chillie willie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these. I enjoyed using them for about a month before they started falling apart. A piece broke off on the tongs and the whisk fell off the handle. I’ve only hand washed these. I will not be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Broke already!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this one much and it already broke. Worst part is I couldn’t find the piece so it was probably in our food and I didn’t noticed until after we ate while cleaning them!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T Tran

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these utensils! They are adorable and super chic. They hold up well and are very easy to clean! Will be purchasing more of these for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and durable
customer_reviews.text: These work great, clean well, and look cute on my countertop. Way better than the cheap plastic ones I used in my last apartment, a good gift for anyone moving to a new apartment or college students that like to cook
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Really great matching set
customer_reviews.text: A lot of my cooking utensils were starting to get old and they were all a mismatched set so I decided to invest in a brand new matching set and found these. I love the color, it matches perfectly with my kitchen. We cook dinner at home at least 6 nights a week and the quality of these items is great.
customer_reviews.author: CCWShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They look nice, and are soft enough to not scratch my pots/pans lining when cooking!
customer_reviews.author: dawn j orchard

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after opening before first use
customer_reviews.text: The silicone cane off the wooden handle the same day I received the set. Returning immediately
customer_reviews.author: Sean Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my wife wanted. Not so much in the doghouse now!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Handle holds water.
customer_reviews.text: Spatula,handle holds water, makes grease pop when in use for eggs for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sivewright

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've ever bought other than pots and pans
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Silicone is the way to go!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new set of cooking utensils and came across this set. Had been using the standard metal and plastic which some had ruined my pans. They left scratch marks. With these though since they are silicone, you don't need to worry about that anymore. Great buy and will start looking for more of this material for my cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: R6Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item but can not used that,quality so bad,don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Nasrin Khan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Good, durable quality for cost. I only wish I could purchase items individually, as having two rounded spatulas would be nice!
customer_reviews.author: osul.morgan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Got it and washed it all in the dishwasher, however the risk I guess had a small crack and it got bigger... probably not dishwasher safe..
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy set and has every utensil that I would need. I love that it comes with a holder for the utensils. This would also make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gladieux

customer_reviews.title: Untreated handles splinters
customer_reviews.text: The handles are treated. They were splinters all over them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So so sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had two items from this set break and the tops came off. Won’t stay on so basically useless
customer_reviews.author: Diane McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great, in some ways
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and feel. DO NOT PUT IN DISHWASHER. the smooth handles became rough and splintered. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control. Good if you get finished product.
customer_reviews.text: These are great assuming you get finished product. Two of mine arrived unsanded and finished handles. They are rough and likely will not last as the wood is unsealed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hussey

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Durable and strong but light and work amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AgentLABeam

customer_reviews.title: No more scratched pots.
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift . Love them look good and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M. Stark

customer_reviews.title: A gift rating
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to a my sister and her culinary teacher husband and he really like that it was silicon and not plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Tefflon safe!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these for a Christmas gift, then decided to use myself! Very durable and does well on my tefflon sealed pans.
customer_reviews.author: KShipp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! We bought new pans and zi wanted utensils yhat wouldn't scrath them all up. These are perfect. The rubber is soft but durable and the wooden handles give a nice rustic look. My new favorite kitchen tools!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Price is just right
customer_reviews.text: Great price...do not wash in machine its wood... works fine and dries quickly
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: The whisk broke after only one use. I looked to see if you can purchase individual utensils, but you cannot. Now I have to buy a whisk that does not match. Disappointed, however I do like the rest of the pieces in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 2 months. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: MuMu

customer_reviews.title: Cooks helper
customer_reviews.text: They look great. The spatulas are smaller then expected. Other then that they are nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my copper pots/pans. They are the perfect size and super sturdy. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Weak ass set
customer_reviews.text: I got this set and within a week the whisk utensil had separated from the bamboo base. I've requested a return and swap so will update if this next set is better quality. So far very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Set - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and materials. Feel great in hands and gentle to non-stick surfaces. Stop looking and click "Buy Now". You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set, and the wooden handles add some class to them. Great variety and the sizes are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: SNAPPED
customer_reviews.text: I liked them until I went to use the spatula to dig out some banana bread and it snapped. Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kayze413

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean. The bamboo handles are great. I trashed all utensils I had in my kitchen. This is the perfect set!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Cristian Frausto

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 2-3 months now and the some of the heads (spatula and whisk) keep falling off. I loved the way this looked but it isn't the best quality :/
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: of high quality
customer_reviews.text: This tableware is very stylish and durable, and I like the rubber on the top, which gives it good grip and makes it very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mai

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. ESy to clean and I can tell they will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Clean super easy and don’t ruin my pans. Amazing value
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really used them, more for decor, but super cute
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Nice durability!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice utensils! A little small but perfect for someone that doesn't cook big meals everyday of the week!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy these
customer_reviews.text: I have zero regrets about buying these if one were to break I'd buy the entire set again
customer_reviews.author: mark southworth

customer_reviews.title: Great full set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice that I love it I love the wood and black color look because it matches my kitchen perfectly and I love it it’s a complete set of utensils so it’s everything I need I have so many miss matched right now and they’re old I’m gonna get rid of everything in this replaces all of that it’s so nice to have a full matching set
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 11 piece set and box said 11 piece set but only 9 in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product is not dishwasher safe. I've been using this for a couple of weeks. I love the way they look, feel and I can cook with them easily. After I put them in the dishwasher, the handles lost all their coating. Looks horrible now. Not happy if I can use them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: Serious design flaws
customer_reviews.text: These look great and work great in theory, but the wood and silicone are not attached well enough and the spatula broke on our second time using it. After the wood, and holding the silicone, is very flimsy plastic. So not only is there a gap between the two pieces (which if it actually didn't break right away could have led to cleaning headaches), but the item is actually much weaker than it appears. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: JamesFan

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These look nice but do not hold up at all. First use of the whisk to whisk eggs, the handle started from the whisk. First use of the spatula, the handle flat out broke from the handle. Very poor quality product. If you want something to last, that you can use more than once, this is not it. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Buist

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily. Buy only to look at...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product. Who doesn’t love bamboo handles with a slew of great reviews. Unfortunately, this set will not last. I’ve had it only a short time and already a handle snapped off the spatula when...wait for it...I was turning ground beef. Seriously. They look nice but if something breaks within a month, is it really worth anything at all? I was hoping to contact the seller but didn’t have that option.
customer_reviews.author: Shuxy

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a pain
customer_reviews.text: We tested 1 in the dishwasher, ruined it on light wash with no heated dry. So hand wash only. They have worn down on the handles pretty quickly which is disappointing but I guess expected for the price. Sauce and food get stuck between the handle and the silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nicely crafted silicon kitchen set
customer_reviews.text: Very useful complete set of silicon utensils for every occasion, gentle on my kitchenware. Silicon is the way to go, it does not scatch easily on my pans, less prone to stick and can take the heat. Nicely crafted with wood imprinted with the word Chef’s Hands. I handwash them mostly, except for the stainless steel tong which I accasionally throw in the dishwasher. Useful as described, and if the price is right, this may be for you. Recommended. I will update this review if needed to share more experiences and therefore a frame of reference. I will add some photos shortly, if you found these extra photos useful, please take a moment to click YES below. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DAYS FamilyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Wait and See
customer_reviews.text: I have been gradually phasing out any non-silicone cooking utensils for some time in order to preserve my cookware, eliminate melt-able plastics that might leach unwanted chemicals, metals that scratch and transfer heat, and wood that can flavor foods. I liked this set because it combined silicone heat-proof non-scratch ends with wooden handles that don't transfer heat. My only concern on these are staining and swelling of the handles when exposed to liquids. I'll have to see how they hold up in the long term, but in the short feel they are a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: keygirlTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: This worked great and I enjoyed using them every day cooking or serving nice meals
customer_reviews.text: I used these utensils every day and they washed very well with no staining. I never put these in the dishwasher to preserve them longer. Unfortunately, one of the utensil heads became wobbly within a few weeks. I was concerned food would get trapped and cause contamination so I stopped using the one utensil. However, two more utensils became wobbly and one even came completely off the utensil handle. If it was food-safe to glue together, I certainly would have. I ended up returning them. I hope to find full silicone utensils without the wood handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money-not best in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome and has all that I need for the kitchen. Great value and I love the gray and wood color. The only setback is that once you wash these in the dishwasher the handles no longer feel smooth. The heat must take away that outer surface. It is not a major issue and they are very durable otherwise. I was just disappointed that the smooth finish is gone. But since I washed a few of them, I have since washed all of them so they are now all un-smooth. lol
customer_reviews.author: Casie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: I switched from metal to nonstick and needed utensils appropriate for the new pans. They work well but would like to see more toughness in the silicone portion. The handles are sturdy and the set even includes tongs which is awesome as I love those. If you leave them sitting in the pan or on the stove they do get a bit hot so you need to move them after stirring your food. They did not burn but were extremely hot to the touch and burned my hand slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Solid kitchen essentials
customer_reviews.text: The utensils are light, and sturdy. They dont feel cheap, i like the wooden part, better than the steel utensil i previously had, they started getting rusty. So far i couldn't find anything wrong with them, but as time progress, i will keep you guys updated! Hope the picture and my take helps
customer_reviews.author: Jordan's Experience ☺️Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: This is a so so product.
customer_reviews.text: Kind f flimsy, but the price is cheap. If you want something to impress your guests, this isn't it. I will give this a year before 3 of the pieces are broke, bent, or haven't been used. Starter set, maybe. But if you're looking for an upgrade, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buske

customer_reviews.title: Fricking love these - best I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded all my pots and pans and wanted new cooking utensils, too. These were cheap, well reviewed, and there were lots of them. I had low-ish expectations, but I love these! Not only do they not melt at high temperatures (something I've seen happen even with "high temperature" utensils), but they get all the sauce or oil off the pans. The flat spatulas are so good that they practically clean your pans when you scrape the food out. Honestly, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brian C-J

customer_reviews.title: A little upsetting, update
customer_reviews.text: I love the look. I bought these because the set has everything I needed but mainly a whisk that wouldn't rust...so when I was whisking pancakes and it fell apart I was upset. Then I used one of the spatulas and it's broken under the silicone. Besides these issues I do like the set. But now I need a new whisk since I threw my other one out. It's been less then a year and I'm looking into a better quality set. Yes these look good but now only the tongs and brush are actually usable. Everything else either came apart or to flimsy to use
customer_reviews.author: A. Manzaro

customer_reviews.title: Spatulas are not stiff enough
customer_reviews.text: These are great utensils, especially for the price. I have had them for a little over a month now and was able to replace all my previous untensils with them. They are holding up well. Only thing that I don't like about them is the the spatulas are too flimsy. A spatula should be stiff for flipping food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
